00027 #include "MEM_guardedalloc.h"

00029 #include "BLI_math.h"
00030 #include "BLI_array.h"

00032 #include "bmesh.h"

00036 enum {
00037     EXT_INPUT   = 1,
00038     EXT_KEEP    = 2,
00039     EXT_DEL     = 4
00040 };
00041 
00042 #define VERT_MARK 1
00043 #define EDGE_MARK 1
00044 #define FACE_MARK 1
00045 #define VERT_NONMAN 2
00046 #define EDGE_NONMAN 2
00047 
00048 void bmo_extrude_face_indiv_exec(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
00049 {
00050     BMOIter siter;
00051     BMIter liter, liter2;
00052     BMFace *f, *f2, *f3;
00053     BMLoop *l, *l2, *l3, *l4, *l_tmp;
00054     BMEdge **edges = NULL, *e, *laste;
00055     BMVert *v, *lastv, *firstv;
00056     BLI_array_declare(edges);
00057     int i;
00058 
00059     BMO_ITER (f, &siter, bm, op, "faces", BM_FACE) {
00060         BLI_array_empty(edges);
00061         BLI_array_growitems(edges, f->len);
00062 
00063         i = 0;
00064         firstv = lastv = NULL;
00065         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, f, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00066             v = BM_vert_create(bm, l->v->co, l->v);
00067 
00068             /* skip on the first iteration */
00069             if (lastv) {
00070                 e = BM_edge_create(bm, lastv, v, l->e, FALSE);
00071                 edges[i++] = e;
00072             }
00073 
00074             lastv = v;
00075             laste = l->e;
00076             if (!firstv) firstv = v;
00077         }
00078 
00079         /* this fits in the array because we skip one in the loop above */
00080         e = BM_edge_create(bm, v, firstv, laste, FALSE);
00081         edges[i++] = e;
00082 
00083         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, f, EXT_DEL);
00084 
00085         f2 = BM_face_create_ngon(bm, firstv, BM_edge_other_vert(edges[0], firstv), edges, f->len, FALSE);
00086         if (!f2) {
00087             BMO_error_raise(bm, op, BMERR_MESH_ERROR, "Extrude failed; could not create face");
00088             BLI_array_free(edges);
00089             return;
00090         }
00091         
00092         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, f2, EXT_KEEP);
00093         BM_elem_attrs_copy(bm, bm, f, f2);
00094 
00095         l2 = BM_iter_new(&liter2, bm, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE, f2);
00096         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, f, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00097             BM_elem_attrs_copy(bm, bm, l, l2);
00098 
00099             l3 = l->next;
00100             l4 = l2->next;
00101 
00102             f3 = BM_face_create_quad_tri(bm, l3->v, l4->v, l2->v, l->v, f, FALSE);
00103 
00104             l_tmp = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f3);
00105 
00106             BM_elem_attrs_copy(bm, bm, l->next, l_tmp);  l_tmp = l_tmp->next;
00107             BM_elem_attrs_copy(bm, bm, l->next, l_tmp);  l_tmp = l_tmp->next;
00108             BM_elem_attrs_copy(bm, bm, l, l_tmp);        l_tmp = l_tmp->next;
00109             BM_elem_attrs_copy(bm, bm, l, l_tmp);
00110 
00111             l2 = BM_iter_step(&liter2);
00112         }
00113     }
00114 
00115     BLI_array_free(edges);
00116 
00117     BMO_op_callf(bm, "del geom=%ff context=%i", EXT_DEL, DEL_ONLYFACES);
00118     BMO_slot_buffer_from_enabled_flag(bm, op, "faceout", BM_FACE, EXT_KEEP);
00119 }
00120 
00131 static void bm_extrude_copy_face_loop_attributes(BMesh *bm, BMFace *f, BMEdge *e_a, BMEdge *e_b)
00132 {
00133     /* 'a' is the starting edge #e, 'b' is the final edge #newedge */
00134     BMLoop *l_dst_a = BM_face_edge_share_loop(f, e_a);
00135     BMLoop *l_dst_b = BM_face_edge_share_loop(f, e_b);
00136     /* we could only have a face on one-or the other edges,
00137      * check if either side of the face has an adjacent face */
00138     BMLoop *l_src_1;
00139     BMLoop *l_src_2;
00140 
00141     /* there is no l_src_b */
00142 
00143     /* sanity */
00144     BLI_assert(l_dst_a->f == l_dst_b->f);
00145 
00146     if (l_dst_a != l_dst_a->radial_next) {
00147         l_src_1 = l_dst_a->radial_next;
00148         l_src_2 = l_src_1->next;
00149     }
00150     else if (l_dst_b != l_dst_b->radial_next) {
00151         l_src_2 = l_dst_b->radial_next;
00152         l_src_1 = l_src_2->next;
00153     }
00154     else {
00155         /* no new faces on either edge, nothing to copy from */
00156         return;
00157     }
00158 
00159     BM_elem_attrs_copy(bm, bm, l_src_1->f, l_dst_a->f);
00160     BM_elem_flag_disable(f, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN); /* possibly we copy from a hidden face */
00161 
00162     /* copy data */
00163     BM_elem_attrs_copy(bm, bm, l_src_2, l_dst_a);
00164     BM_elem_attrs_copy(bm, bm, l_src_2, l_dst_b->next);
00165 
00166     BM_elem_attrs_copy(bm, bm, l_src_1, l_dst_a->next);
00167     BM_elem_attrs_copy(bm, bm, l_src_1, l_dst_b);
00168 }
00169 
00170 void bmo_extrude_edge_only_exec(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
00171 {
00172     BMOIter siter;
00173     BMOperator dupeop;
00174     BMVert *v1, *v2, *v3, *v4;
00175     BMEdge *e, *e2;
00176     BMFace *f;
00177     
00178     BMO_ITER (e, &siter, bm, op, "edges", BM_EDGE) {
00179         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e, EXT_INPUT);
00180         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e->v1, EXT_INPUT);
00181         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e->v2, EXT_INPUT);
00182     }
00183 
00184     BMO_op_initf(bm, &dupeop, "dupe geom=%fve", EXT_INPUT);
00185     BMO_op_exec(bm, &dupeop);
00186 
00187     for (e = BMO_iter_new(&siter, bm, &dupeop, "boundarymap", 0); e; e = BMO_iter_step(&siter)) {
00188         e2 = BMO_iter_map_value(&siter);
00189         e2 = *(BMEdge **)e2;
00190 
00191         if (e->l && e->v1 != e->l->v) {
00192             v1 = e->v1;
00193             v2 = e->v2;
00194             v3 = e2->v2;
00195             v4 = e2->v1;
00196         }
00197         else {
00198             v1 = e2->v1;
00199             v2 = e2->v2;
00200             v3 = e->v2;
00201             v4 = e->v1;
00202         }
00203         /* not sure what to do about example face, pass NULL for now */
00204         f = BM_face_create_quad_tri(bm, v1, v2, v3, v4, NULL, FALSE);
00205         bm_extrude_copy_face_loop_attributes(bm, f, e, e2);
00206         
00207         if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, e, EXT_INPUT))
00208             e = e2;
00209         
00210         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, f, EXT_KEEP);
00211         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e, EXT_KEEP);
00212         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e->v1, EXT_KEEP);
00213         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e->v2, EXT_KEEP);
00214         
00215     }
00216 
00217     BMO_op_finish(bm, &dupeop);
00218 
00219     BMO_slot_buffer_from_enabled_flag(bm, op, "geomout", BM_ALL, EXT_KEEP);
00220 }
00221 
00222 void bmo_extrude_vert_indiv_exec(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
00223 {
00224     BMOIter siter;
00225     BMVert *v, *dupev;
00226     BMEdge *e;
00227 
00228     for (v = BMO_iter_new(&siter, bm, op, "verts", BM_VERT); v; v = BMO_iter_step(&siter)) {
00229         dupev = BM_vert_create(bm, v->co, v);
00230 
00231         e = BM_edge_create(bm, v, dupev, NULL, FALSE);
00232 
00233         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e, EXT_KEEP);
00234         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, dupev, EXT_KEEP);
00235     }
00236 
00237     BMO_slot_buffer_from_enabled_flag(bm, op, "vertout", BM_VERT, EXT_KEEP);
00238     BMO_slot_buffer_from_enabled_flag(bm, op, "edgeout", BM_EDGE, EXT_KEEP);
00239 }
00240 
00241 void bmo_extrude_face_region_exec(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
00242 {
00243     BMOperator dupeop, delop;
00244     BMOIter siter;
00245     BMIter iter, fiter, viter;
00246     BMEdge *e, *newedge;
00247     BMVert *verts[4], *v, *v2;
00248     BMFace *f;
00249     int found, fwd, delorig = FALSE;
00250 
00251     /* initialize our sub-operators */
00252     BMO_op_init(bm, &dupeop, "dupe");
00253     
00254     BMO_slot_buffer_flag_enable(bm, op, "edgefacein", BM_EDGE|BM_FACE, EXT_INPUT);
00255     
00256     /* if one flagged face is bordered by an un-flagged face, then we delete
00257      * original geometry unless caller explicitly asked to keep it. */
00258     if (!BMO_slot_bool_get(op, "alwayskeeporig")) {
00259         BM_ITER_MESH (e, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00260 
00261             int edge_face_tot;
00262 
00263             if (!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, e, EXT_INPUT)) {
00264                 continue;
00265             }
00266 
00267             found = FALSE; /* found a face that isn't input? */
00268             edge_face_tot = 0; /* edge/face count */
00269 
00270             BM_ITER_ELEM (f, &fiter, e, BM_FACES_OF_EDGE) {
00271                 if (!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, f, EXT_INPUT)) {
00272                     found = TRUE;
00273                     delorig = TRUE;
00274                     break;
00275                 }
00276 
00277                 edge_face_tot++;
00278             }
00279 
00280             if ((edge_face_tot > 1) && (found == FALSE)) {
00281                 /* edge has a face user, that face isn't extrude input */
00282                 BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e, EXT_DEL);
00283             }
00284         }
00285     }
00286 
00287     /* calculate verts to delete */
00288     BM_ITER_MESH (v, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00289         found = FALSE;
00290 
00291         BM_ITER_ELEM (e, &viter, v, BM_EDGES_OF_VERT) {
00292             if (!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, e, EXT_INPUT) || !BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, e, EXT_DEL)) {
00293                 found = TRUE;
00294                 break;
00295             }
00296         }
00297 
00298         /* avoid an extra loop */
00299         if (found == TRUE) {
00300             BM_ITER_ELEM (f, &viter, v, BM_FACES_OF_VERT) {
00301                 if (!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, f, EXT_INPUT)) {
00302                     found = TRUE;
00303                     break;
00304                 }
00305             }
00306         }
00307 
00308         if (found == FALSE) {
00309             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, v, EXT_DEL);
00310         }
00311     }
00312     
00313     BM_ITER_MESH (f, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00314         if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, f, EXT_INPUT)) {
00315             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, f, EXT_DEL);
00316         }
00317     }
00318 
00319     if (delorig == TRUE) {
00320         BMO_op_initf(bm, &delop, "del geom=%fvef context=%i",
00321                      EXT_DEL, DEL_ONLYTAGGED);
00322     }
00323 
00324     BMO_slot_copy(op, &dupeop, "edgefacein", "geom");
00325     BMO_op_exec(bm, &dupeop);
00326 
00327     if (bm->act_face && BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, bm->act_face, EXT_INPUT))
00328         bm->act_face = BMO_slot_map_ptr_get(bm, &dupeop, "facemap", bm->act_face);
00329 
00330     if (delorig) {
00331         BMO_op_exec(bm, &delop);
00332     }
00333     
00334     /* if not delorig, reverse loops of original face */
00335     if (!delorig) {
00336         BM_ITER_MESH (f, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00337             if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, f, EXT_INPUT)) {
00338                 BM_face_normal_flip(bm, f);
00339             }
00340         }
00341     }
00342     
00343     BMO_slot_copy(&dupeop, op, "newout", "geomout");
00344 
00345     for (e = BMO_iter_new(&siter, bm, &dupeop, "boundarymap", 0); e; e = BMO_iter_step(&siter)) {
00346 
00347         /* this should always be wire, so this is mainly a speedup to avoid map lookup */
00348         if (BM_edge_is_wire(e) && BMO_slot_map_contains(bm, op, "exclude", e)) {
00349             /* The original edge was excluded,
00350              * this would result in a standalone wire edge - see [#30399] */
00351             BM_edge_kill(bm, e);
00352 
00353             continue;
00354         }
00355 
00356         newedge = *(BMEdge **)BMO_iter_map_value(&siter);
00357 
00358         if (!newedge) {
00359             continue;
00360         }
00361 
00362         /* orient loop to give same normal as a loop of newedge
00363          * if it exists (will be an extruded face),
00364          * else same normal as a loop of e, if it exists */
00365         if (!newedge->l)
00366             fwd = !e->l || !(e->l->v == e->v1);
00367         else
00368             fwd = (newedge->l->v == newedge->v1);
00369 
00370         
00371         if (fwd) {
00372             verts[0] = e->v1;
00373             verts[1] = e->v2;
00374             verts[2] = newedge->v2;
00375             verts[3] = newedge->v1;
00376         }
00377         else {
00378             verts[3] = e->v1;
00379             verts[2] = e->v2;
00380             verts[1] = newedge->v2;
00381             verts[0] = newedge->v1;
00382         }
00383 
00384         /* not sure what to do about example face, pass NULL for now */
00385         f = BM_face_create_quad_tri_v(bm, verts, 4, NULL, FALSE);
00386         bm_extrude_copy_face_loop_attributes(bm, f, e, newedge);
00387     }
00388 
00389     /* link isolated vert */
00390     for (v = BMO_iter_new(&siter, bm, &dupeop, "isovertmap", 0); v; v = BMO_iter_step(&siter)) {
00391         v2 = *((void **)BMO_iter_map_value(&siter));
00392         BM_edge_create(bm, v, v2, v->e, TRUE);
00393     }
00394 
00395     /* cleanup */
00396     if (delorig) BMO_op_finish(bm, &delop);
00397     BMO_op_finish(bm, &dupeop);
00398 }
00399 
00400 /*
00401  * Compute higher-quality vertex normals used by solidify.
00402  * Only considers geometry in the marked solidify region.
00403  * Note that this does not work so well for non-manifold
00404  * regions.
00405  */
00406 static void calc_solidify_normals(BMesh *bm)
00407 {
00408     BMIter viter, eiter, fiter;
00409     BMVert *v;
00410     BMEdge *e;
00411     BMFace *f, *f1, *f2;
00412     float edge_normal[3];
00413     int i;
00414 
00415     /* can't use BM_edge_face_count because we need to count only marked faces */
00416     int *edge_face_count = MEM_callocN(sizeof(int) * bm->totedge, __func__);
00417 
00418     BM_ITER_MESH (v, &viter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00419         BM_elem_flag_enable(v, BM_ELEM_TAG);
00420     }
00421 
00422     BM_mesh_elem_index_ensure(bm, BM_EDGE);
00423 
00424     BM_ITER_MESH (f, &fiter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00425         if (!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, f, FACE_MARK)) {
00426             continue;
00427         }
00428 
00429         BM_ITER_ELEM (e, &eiter, f, BM_EDGES_OF_FACE) {
00430 
00431             /* And mark all edges and vertices on the
00432              * marked faces */
00433             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e, EDGE_MARK);
00434             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e->v1, VERT_MARK);
00435             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e->v2, VERT_MARK);
00436             edge_face_count[BM_elem_index_get(e)]++;
00437         }
00438     }
00439 
00440     BM_ITER_MESH (e, &eiter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00441         if (!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, e, EDGE_MARK)) {
00442             continue;
00443         }
00444 
00445         i = edge_face_count[BM_elem_index_get(e)]++;
00446 
00447         if (i == 0 || i > 2) {
00448             /* Edge & vertices are non-manifold even when considering
00449              * only marked faces */
00450             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e, EDGE_NONMAN);
00451             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e->v1, VERT_NONMAN);
00452             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e->v2, VERT_NONMAN);
00453         }
00454     }
00455     MEM_freeN(edge_face_count);
00456     edge_face_count = NULL; /* don't re-use */
00457 
00458     BM_ITER_MESH (v, &viter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00459         if (!BM_vert_is_manifold(v)) {
00460             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, v, VERT_NONMAN);
00461             continue;
00462         }
00463 
00464         if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, v, VERT_MARK)) {
00465             zero_v3(v->no);
00466         }
00467     }
00468 
00469     BM_ITER_MESH (e, &eiter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00470 
00471         /* If the edge is not part of a the solidify region
00472          * its normal should not be considered */
00473         if (!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, e, EDGE_MARK)) {
00474             continue;
00475         }
00476 
00477         /* If the edge joins more than two marked faces high
00478          * quality normal computation won't work */
00479         if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, e, EDGE_NONMAN)) {
00480             continue;
00481         }
00482 
00483         f1 = f2 = NULL;
00484 
00485         BM_ITER_ELEM (f, &fiter, e, BM_FACES_OF_EDGE) {
00486             if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, f, FACE_MARK)) {
00487                 if (f1 == NULL) {
00488                     f1 = f;
00489                 }
00490                 else {
00491                     BLI_assert(f2 == NULL);
00492                     f2 = f;
00493                 }
00494             }
00495         }
00496 
00497         BLI_assert(f1 != NULL);
00498 
00499         if (f2 != NULL) {
00500             const float angle = angle_normalized_v3v3(f1->no, f2->no);
00501 
00502             if (angle > 0.0f) {
00503                 /* two faces using this edge, calculate the edge normal
00504                  * using the angle between the faces as a weighting */
00505                 add_v3_v3v3(edge_normal, f1->no, f2->no);
00506                 normalize_v3(edge_normal);
00507                 mul_v3_fl(edge_normal, angle);
00508             }
00509             else {
00510                 /* can't do anything useful here!
00511                  * Set the face index for a vert in case it gets a zero normal */
00512                 BM_elem_flag_disable(e->v1, BM_ELEM_TAG);
00513                 BM_elem_flag_disable(e->v2, BM_ELEM_TAG);
00514                 continue;
00515             }
00516         }
00517         else {
00518             /* only one face attached to that edge */
00519             /* an edge without another attached- the weight on this is
00520              * undefined, M_PI / 2 is 90d in radians and that seems good enough */
00521             copy_v3_v3(edge_normal, f1->no);
00522             mul_v3_fl(edge_normal, M_PI / 2);
00523         }
00524 
00525         add_v3_v3(e->v1->no, edge_normal);
00526         add_v3_v3(e->v2->no, edge_normal);
00527     }
00528 
00529     /* normalize accumulated vertex normal */
00530     BM_ITER_MESH (v, &viter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00531         if (!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, v, VERT_MARK)) {
00532             continue;
00533         }
00534 
00535         if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, v, VERT_NONMAN)) {
00536             /* use standard normals for vertices connected to non-manifold edges */
00537             BM_vert_normal_update(v);
00538         }
00539         else if (normalize_v3(v->no) == 0.0f && !BM_elem_flag_test(v, BM_ELEM_TAG)) {
00540             /* exceptional case, totally flat. use the normal
00541              * of any marked face around the vertex */
00542             BM_ITER_ELEM (f, &fiter, v, BM_FACES_OF_VERT) {
00543                 if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, f, FACE_MARK)) {
00544                     break;
00545                 }
00546             }
00547             copy_v3_v3(v->no, f->no);
00548         }
00549     }
00550 }
00551 
00552 static void solidify_add_thickness(BMesh *bm, const float dist)
00553 {
00554     BMFace *f;
00555     BMVert *v;
00556     BMLoop *l;
00557     BMIter iter, loopIter;
00558     float *vert_angles = MEM_callocN(sizeof(float) * bm->totvert * 2, "solidify"); /* 2 in 1 */
00559     float *vert_accum = vert_angles + bm->totvert;
00560     int i, index;
00561 
00562     /* array for passing verts to angle_poly_v3 */
00563     float **verts = NULL;
00564     BLI_array_staticdeclare(verts, BM_NGON_STACK_SIZE);
00565     /* array for receiving angles from angle_poly_v3 */
00566     float *face_angles = NULL;
00567     BLI_array_staticdeclare(face_angles, BM_NGON_STACK_SIZE);
00568 
00569     BM_mesh_elem_index_ensure(bm, BM_VERT);
00570 
00571     BM_ITER_MESH (f, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00572         if (!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, f, FACE_MARK)) {
00573             continue;
00574         }
00575 
00576         BLI_array_growitems(verts, f->len);
00577         BM_ITER_ELEM_INDEX (l, &loopIter, f, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE, i) {
00578             verts[i] = l->v->co;
00579         }
00580 
00581         BLI_array_growitems(face_angles, f->len);
00582         angle_poly_v3(face_angles, (const float **)verts, f->len);
00583 
00584         i = 0;
00585         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &loopIter, f, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00586             v = l->v;
00587             index = BM_elem_index_get(v);
00588             vert_accum[index] += face_angles[i];
00589             vert_angles[index] += shell_angle_to_dist(angle_normalized_v3v3(v->no, f->no)) * face_angles[i];
00590             i++;
00591         }
00592 
00593         BLI_array_empty(verts);
00594         BLI_array_empty(face_angles);
00595     }
00596 
00597     BM_ITER_MESH (v, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00598         index = BM_elem_index_get(v);
00599         if (vert_accum[index]) { /* zero if unselected */
00600             madd_v3_v3fl(v->co, v->no, dist * (vert_angles[index] / vert_accum[index]));
00601         }
00602     }
00603 
00604     MEM_freeN(vert_angles);
00605 
00606     BLI_array_free(verts);
00607     BLI_array_free(face_angles);
00608 }
00609 
00610 void bmo_solidify_face_region_exec(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
00611 {
00612     BMOperator extrudeop;
00613     BMOperator reverseop;
00614     float thickness;
00615 
00616     thickness = BMO_slot_float_get(op, "thickness");
00617 
00618     /* Flip original faces (so the shell is extruded inward) */
00619     BMO_op_init(bm, &reverseop, "reversefaces");
00620     BMO_slot_copy(op, &reverseop, "geom", "faces");
00621     BMO_op_exec(bm, &reverseop);
00622     BMO_op_finish(bm, &reverseop);
00623 
00624     /* Extrude the region */
00625     BMO_op_initf(bm, &extrudeop, "extrude_face_region alwayskeeporig=%b", TRUE);
00626     BMO_slot_copy(op, &extrudeop, "geom", "edgefacein");
00627     BMO_op_exec(bm, &extrudeop);
00628 
00629     /* Push the verts of the extruded faces inward to create thickness */
00630     BMO_slot_buffer_flag_enable(bm, &extrudeop, "geomout", BM_FACE, FACE_MARK);
00631     calc_solidify_normals(bm);
00632     solidify_add_thickness(bm, thickness);
00633 
00634     BMO_slot_copy(&extrudeop, op, "geomout", "geomout");
00635 
00636     BMO_op_finish(bm, &extrudeop);
00637 }
